data.eml:eml: A review of the genus Aalatettix with the description of a new species from China (Orthoptera: Tetrigidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zheng, Zhemin, Lin, Liliang (2015): A review of the genus Aalatettix with the description of a new species from China (Orthoptera: Tetrigidae). Zootaxa 3986 (4): 488-492, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3986.4.8
